name: Moonlight Energy
overview: Moon Light Energy is a Japanese-style adventure. The heroine of the game is a high school student named Maki, who is focused on just one thing: sex with girls. Most of the game is dedicated to seduction and sexual scenes between Maki and other young women. The interface includes the traditional commands Look, Talk, and Move, as well as context-specific commands grouped under "Action". Sometimes verb commands lead to a selection of objects to interact with. Interactive sex scenes feature detailed commands and special "pleasure bars" for Maki and her partner.
